specialRules.hint: Whenever the hero’s unit fails a morale test it takes D3 wounds and the morale test counts as passed instead.
specialRules.name: Bully
specialRules.label: Bully
specialRules.description: Whenever the hero’s unit fails a morale test it takes D3 wounds and the morale test counts as passed instead.

specialRules.hint: When this unit is activated pick 2 enemy units within 6”. Those units get -1 to their melee rolls next time they fight.
specialRules.name: Chilling Aura
specialRules.label: Chilling Aura
specialRules.description: When this unit is activated pick 2 enemy units within 6”. Those units get -1 to their melee rolls next time they fight.

specialRules.hint: Whenever this unit deals a wound in melee, place a devour marker next to it. When this unit is activated you may remove any number of devour markers and roll that many dice. For each 4+ you may remove one wound from this unit.
specialRules.name: Devour
specialRules.label: Devour
specialRules.description: Whenever this unit deals a wound in melee, place a devour marker next to it. When this unit is activated you may remove any number of devour markers and roll that many dice. For each 4+ you may remove one wound from this unit.

specialRules.hint: Enemy units get -1 to their melee rolls when fighting against this unit.
specialRules.name: Frost
specialRules.label: Frost
specialRules.description: Enemy units get -1 to their melee rolls when fighting against this unit.

specialRules.hint: The hero and his unit count as having Regeneration.

specialRules.description: The hero and his unit count as having Regeneration.

specialRules.hint: This model gets AP(+2) when fighting units with Tough(3) or higher.
specialRules.name: Hunter

specialRules.description: This model gets AP(+2) when fighting units with Tough(3) or higher.

specialRules.hint: Attacks targeting this model count as having AP(-1).

specialRules.description: Attacks targeting this model count as having AP(-1).

specialRules.hint: The hero and his unit count as having Impact(1).

spells.name: Gorge
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets Furious next time it charges.

spells.name: Gobble
spells.effect: Target enemy model within 12” takes 1 automatic hit with AP(2).

spells.name: Crack
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” gets -2 to hit next time it shoots.

spells.name: Crush
spells.effect: Target 2 enemy units within 6” take 4 hits with AP(1) each.

spells.name: Guts
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” may immediately charge by up to 6” and gets +1 to hit for that melee.

spells.name: The Maw
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 8 automatic hits.
